channel.title: dreams on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in dreams on Barefoot Rob

item.title: different types of dreams
item.description: 12:14 Wednesday 07 August 2019 JST Just this morning I realized I have at least two different types of dreams. One type seems to just be my brain sorting stuff out. I dream about work or mundane things like that. Another type seems to be a place that I go. The scenes are always filled with friends living together in a building with multiple rooms, a campground with multiple cabins, multiple levels with stairs and stuff, and a lot of different activity happening.

item.title: How to have lucid dreams
item.description: Have you ever found yourself flying like a bird, only to later realize it was a dream? Have you been chased by “bad guys” or haunted by scary situations in your dreams? “Lucid dreaming” is a state of dreaming while being aware that you are dreaming. Lucid dreaming allows me to have more fun flying dreams and fewer scary dreams. This is how I got started: There are a few techniques I have used at different times of my life.

item.title: dreams, including being rich
item.description: ##06:01 Saturday 07 March 2015 JST## I needed a red mat for the kitchen like a non slip mat and went up a long road loooking forw one and found one up a long hallway curivng to the right in a hotel and found one outisde a house, so I took it and walked back and then got all the way back and asked a guy if he new knew where I could buy it and he goes yeah my brother and called his brother down and I bought a mat from him.

item.title: Awake early
item.description: ##03:47 Monday 15 December 2014 JST## I woke up around 2:30am and have written a few journal entries, including the dream I had when I woke up, but am going back to bed.
